column4: Speaking of the torrent, where is the link?  I can't seem to find it on the ubuntu.com site...
Thanks Ali_ix...  Man, the mirrors are getting hammered...
yes! all servers are under fire :D it is an alternative mirror list i found :)
Well, I suppose it's a credit to the ferocity of the Ubuntu crowd...
I don't know if I'm the only one having problems, but it looks like the torrent tracker is now inundated too...  I can't get a response from the server...
i am downling now and there is atleast 2500 peers connected
